i am in school.

i feel that i can t live up to many people s standards.

participant_2.background:
I'd like to talk about my beard and how it has been a part of my life.
I played a concert last night and was nervous about how my outfit would look on stage, but I ended up getting a lot of compliments!
my favorite drink is cuba libre.
I have two weaknesses: my eyes and my driving skills.

content.text: Hi, how are you?
Hello! I'm doing great. How about you?
I'm doing well, thanks! I just had a nice conversation with my dad about fishing.
That sounds nice! I used to go fishing with my dad when I was younger.
Me too! It was always a lot of fun.
Yeah, it was. I miss those days.
Me too.
What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to listen to music, hang out with my dog, and go to concerts.
Oh, cool! I like to listen to music too. What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I mostly listen to pop and rock.
Me too! I love pop music.
Yeah, it's so catchy.
Right? What are some of your favorite bands?
I like Justin Bieber, Selena Gomez, and Ariana Grande.
Oh, cool! I like all of those artists too.
Yeah, they're great.
Yeah, they are.
What are some of your favorite concerts that you've been to?
I've been to a lot of great concerts, but my favorite one was probably when I saw Justin Bieber in concert last year.
Oh, that sounds amazing! I'm so jealous.
It was! He's such a great performer.
Yeah, he is.
I'm hoping to see him in concert again someday.
Me too! I'm sure it'll be a great show.
